text: فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَا قَالَ لِفَتَىٰهُ ءَاتِنَا غَدَآءَنَا لَقَدۡ لَقِينَا مِن سَفَرِنَا هَٰذَا نَصَبٗا

translation.en: So when they had passed beyond it, [Moses] said to his boy, "Bring us our morning meal. We have certainly suffered in this, our journey, [much] fatigue
translation.id: Maka ketika mereka telah melewati (tempat itu), Musa berkata kepada pembantunya, "Bawalah ke mari makanan kita; sungguh kita telah merasa letih karena perjalanan kita ini
